prerequisite.name: Checking for mobile-enabled schemas
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pg_namespace WHERE nspname = 'xm');
prerequisite.message: This package may not be applied to a mobile-enabled database. Please see your system administrator or contact xTuple.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Credit Card payments on Sales Orders
prerequisite.query: WITH counter AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS freq FROM payco GROUP BY payco_ccpay_id, payco_cohead_id ORDER BY 1) SELECT COALESCE(MAX(freq), 1) <= 1 FROM counter;
prerequisite.message: There are duplicate payco_ccpay_id and payco_cohead_id on the payco table. Please see your system administrator or contact xTuple.
